amendment.description: To honor the contributions of all unions to the development and building of the United States, and for other purposes.

vote.text: Amendment SA 842 agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.

action.text: Amendment SA 842 proposed by Senator McConnell for Senator Hatch. (consideration: CR S7197; text: CRS S7197) To honor the contributions of all unions to the development and building of the United States, and for other purposes.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 842 proposed by Senator McConnell for Senator Hatch.
Senate amendment agreed to: Amendment SA 842 agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.
